attributes.action: invite the Home Secretary, Jacqui Smith to resign for infringing our rightfor free speech.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This week has seen the decline of Britain’s standing throughout the world as a figurehead of Freedom. This is because of this Government's decision to prevent an Elected Member of Parliament within a European State from entering this country because the subject that they were visiting to discuss is not politically correct.

The Home Secretary is responsible for this fundamental assault on the Freedom of British People to decide whether this subject is allowable or not.

As such someone with this lack of capability should resign from office and restore some credibility to this once great country.
